params._debtRatio: Pool fund allocation to this strategy
params._interestFee: Fee on earnings from this strategy

availableCreditLimit(address).details: Available credit limit is calculated based on current debt of pool and strategy, current debt limit of pool and strategy. credit available = min(pool's debt limit, strategy's debt limit, max debt per rebalance) when some strategy do not pay back outstanding debt, this impact credit line of other strategy if totalDebt of pool >= debtLimit of pool

decreaseDebt(address,uint256).details: In case of withdraw from strategy, pool will decrease debt by amount withdrawn

params._decreaseBy: Amount by which strategy debt will be decreased

init(address).details: This init function meant to be called after proxy deployment.DO NOT CALL it with proxy deploy

migrateStrategy(address,address).details: Migrating strategy aka old and new strategy should be of same type.New strategy will replace old strategy in strategy mapping, strategies array, withdraw queue.

removeStrategy(uint256).details: Revoke and remove strategy from array. Update withdraw queue. Withdraw queue order should not change after remove. Strategy can be removed only after it has paid all debt. Use migrate strategy if debt is not paid and want to upgrade strategy.

reportEarning(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Strategy call this in regular interval.

params._loss: Reduce debt ,also reduce debtRatio, increase loss in record.
params._payback: strategy willing to payback outstanding above debtLimit. no performance fee on this amount.  when governance has reduced debtRatio of strategy, strategy will report profit and payback amount separately.
params._profit: yield generated by strategy. Strategy get performance fee on this amount

sweepERC20(address).details: Transfer given ERC20 token to pool

params._strategy: Strategy address for which debt rate is being updated

updateDebtRatio(address,uint256).details: A strategy is retired when debtRatio is 0

params._strategy: Strategy address for which debt ratio is being updated
Strategy address for which interest fee is being updated

updateWithdrawQueue(address[]).details: Pool always keep some buffer amount to satisfy withdrawal request, any withdrawal request higher than buffer will withdraw from withdraw queue. So withdrawQueue[0] will be the first strategy where withdrawal request will be send.

devdoc.title: Accountant for Vesper pools which keep records of strategies.

addStrategy(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Add strategy. Once strategy is added it can call rebalance and borrow fund from pool and invest that fund in provider/lender.

availableCreditLimit(address).notice: Get available credit limit of strategy. This is the amount strategy can borrow from pool

decreaseDebt(address,uint256).notice: Decrease debt of strategy, also decrease totalDebt

migrateStrategy(address,address).notice: Migrate existing strategy to new strategy.

totalDebtOf(address).notice: Get total debt of given strategy

updateWithdrawQueue(address[]).notice: Update withdraw queue. Withdraw queue is list of strategy in the order in which funds should be withdrawn.
